es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.views

Interface BoardUI.PlayControlsListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtaxxSwingView, ATTTSwingView, ConnectNSwingView, GenericSwingView, TicTacToeSwingView
    Enclosing class:
    BoardUI

    public static interface BoardUI.PlayControlsListener
    An interface with methods to perform actions when a cell is clicked

    Una interfaz que proporciona metodos para realizar acciones cuando una casilla es clicada.

    Author:
    David Fdez Alcoba, Manuel Sánchez Torrón

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Contains the action to be performed when a left click takes place in one of the squares Contiene la accion a realizar cuando se produce un click izquierdo

      Contains the action to be performed when a right click takes place in one of the squares Contiene la accion a realizar cuando se produce un click derecho

      • squareWasLeftClicked

        void squareWasLeftClicked(int i,
                        int j)
                          throws GameError
        Contains the action to be performed when a left click takes place in one of the squares

        Contiene la accion a realizar cuando se produce un click izquierdo

        Parameters:
        i - row in which the square is.
        j - col in which the square is.
        Throws:
        GameError
